name: Running Out of Time (Dontejones)
description:
Just a learning project.

A simple project to learn basic Unity skills. There is no end, and the difficulty does not increase.

Robert Russell, a brilliant scientist, is a survivor of a man-made plague that transforms humans into bloodthirsty mutants. He wanders alone through New York City, calling out for other possible survivors, and works on finding a cure for the plague using his own immune blood.
